title: Interviews RAG
description: RAG Actor for querying meeting notes. For Standby mode: Configure OPENAI_API_KEY, PINECONE_API_KEY, and INDEX_NAME as Actor environment variables. For local development: Use INPUT.json. For batch mode: All fields can be provided here.

pinecone_key.title: Pinecone API Key
pinecone_key.description: Your Pinecone API key. On Apify: Use env var PINECONE_API_KEY instead. For local dev: Set here.

openai_key.title: OpenAI API Key
openai_key.description: Your OpenAI API key. On Apify: Use env var OPENAI_API_KEY instead. For local dev: Set here.

index_name.title: Pinecone Index Name
index_name.description: Name of the Pinecone index. On Apify: Use env var INDEX_NAME instead. For local dev: Set here.

question.title: Question (for batch mode)
question.description: Your question about the meeting notes/interviews. In Standby mode, provide this via HTTP request instead.

k.title: Top K Results
k.description: Number of documents to retrieve (1-50). Env var: K

threshold.title: Similarity Threshold
threshold.description: Minimum similarity score for retrieved documents (0.0-1.0). Env var: THRESHOLD

recency_weight.title: Recency Weight
recency_weight.description: How much to favor recent documents (0.0 = only similarity, 1.0 = only recency). Env var: RECENCY_WEIGHT

recency_decay_days.title: Recency Decay (Days)
recency_decay_days.description: Half-life for recency scoring - documents this many days old get 50% recency score. Env var: RECENCY_DECAY_DAYS

start_template.title: System Prompt
start_template.description: Instructions for how the AI should respond. Env var: START_TEMPLATE
start_template.default: Answer the question based on the context provided.
